Japanese: ２回目以降のクリア　ボーナスはなし
ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

おかげで
少しだけ金がたまったぞ。
English: Thanks to you, we've made little a bit of money.

Japanese:
それとな。
今回の報酬とは別に、
この金をやる。
English: And then, other than the reward money for this job, I'll also give you this.

Japanese:
ガロイ工房がこれまでに
貯めてきた金だ。
全部で/c5２０００Ｇ/c3ある。
English: This is all of the money that the Galouye Workshop has saved up so far. That brings the total up to /c52000G/c3.

Japanese:
これがあれば、なんとか最新型
を買うことができるだろう。
English: With this, you might just be able to purchase one of the latest models.

Japanese: メリッサ＿ちょっとした驚き

何年もかかって貯めた金、
全部使っちまうつもりかい？
English: Are you really planning on giving away all of the money that we've saved up over the years?

Japanese:
顔のわりに、甘いねぇ。
親父は。
English:
Just can't resist those puppy-dog eyes, can you?
Oh, dad.
